hero.title: Your Gateway to Italian Universities
hero.subtitle: 100% Acceptance Guarantee
hero.description: Study in Italy with guaranteed university acceptance, €7,000 annual stipend, and tuition-free education. We handle everything from application to graduation.

services.title: Comprehensive Services for Your
services.subtitle: From application to graduation, we handle everything so you can focus on what matters most - your education.

universityPlacement.title: University Placement
universityPlacement.description: Get guaranteed admission to top Italian universities with our proven application process and university partnerships.

scholarshipAssistance.title: Scholarship Assistance
scholarshipAssistance.description: Secure up to €21,000 in scholarships and financial aid to make your Italian education completely affordable.

documentPreparation.title: Document Preparation
documentPreparation.description: Professional assistance with all required documents, translations, and certifications for your application.

accommodationSupport.title: Accommodation Support
accommodationSupport.description: Find safe, comfortable, and affordable housing near your university with our accommodation assistance.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing for Your
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect package for your Italian university journey. All plans include our 100% acceptance guarantee.

standard.name: Standard Package
standard.description: Perfect for self-motivated students who need essential support for their Italian university application.

premium.name: Premium Package
premium.description: Comprehensive support with personalized guidance and priority assistance for guaranteed success.

guarantee.title: Our Guarantee
guarantee.description: We're so confident in our service that we offer a 100% money-back guarantee if you don't get accepted to an Italian university.

valueProposition.scholarshipDescription: Average scholarship amount our students receive
valueProposition.tuitionDescription: Most Italian universities offer tuition-free education
valueProposition.roiDescription: Investment returns within first year of studies

process.title: Simple 4-Step Process to Your
process.subtitle: Our proven process has helped hundreds of students achieve their dreams of studying in Italy.

consultation.title: Free Consultation
consultation.description: We assess your goals, academic background, and preferences to create a personalized plan for your Italian university journey.

application.title: Application Preparation
application.description: Our experts prepare all required documents, translations, and applications to ensure the highest chance of acceptance.

submission.title: University Submission
submission.description: We submit your applications to carefully selected Italian universities that match your profile and goals.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: From acceptance to arrival in Italy, we provide continuous support including visa assistance and accommodation help.

contact.title: Ready to Start Your
